Class Field<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Field<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type whick is passed in to this class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IField<T>
    public class Field<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IField<T>
    Represent the Field class. Every field track the label, value, required and validation.

        Parameters:
        label - - The label associate with the form field
        required - - The boolean indicating whether a particular field must be completed before the form can be submitted.
        validator - - The validator perform input validation.
